title: Help!! Bizarre visual bug making the game unplayable.
body:
Not entirely sure how to describe it so https://youtu.be/KcRKcqnB47E

This only happens in fullscreen mode. Borderless works fine but has increased input lag so I'd prefer to figure out how to fix it. I've already performed a clean reinstall of both my game and my graphics drivers (AMD for what it's worth). No idea how to fix this.

replies.body: OH O_O! Yea that's definitely awkward to try and play with I bet! It looks to me like some of those game texture files are damaged or missing. I'd try running a quick repair and testing it again.
